BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass a bill introduced by Senator Paterson, S.7662, “AN ACT authorizing the city of New York to reconvey title of certain property to James R. Garrett II”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Reconvey title of certain property to James R. Garrett II (S.7662)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Dilan, S.4973-A, and Committee on Rules, A.8397-A, “AN ACT authorizing the city of New York to reconvey its interest in certain real property acquired by in rem tax foreclosure in the borough of Brooklyn to former owner George Black, or if he is deceased, to the person or persons who would have inherited said property from him or to their successors in interest, notwithstanding expiration of the two year period within  which  application may be made to the city to release its interest in property thus acquired; Block No. 1762, Lot No. 62 on tax map for the borough of Brooklyn.
Items.MatterName: In rem, George Black, Brooklyn (S.4973-A, A.8397-A)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass a bill introduced by Assembly Member Norman, A.6740-A, “AN ACT authorizing the city of New York to reconvey its interest in certain real property acquired by in rem tax foreclosure in the borough of Brooklyn to Jacquesline Menaged, notwithstanding expiration of the two year period within which application may be made to the city to release its interest in property thus acquired; Block No. 1330, Lot No. 32 on the tax map for the borough of Brooklyn”.

State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass a bill introduced by Assembly Member Norman, A.6740-A, “AN ACT authorizing the city of New York to reconvey its interest in certain real property acquired by in rem tax foreclosure in the borough of Brooklyn to Jacquesline Menaged, notwithstanding expiration of the two year period within which application may be made to the city to release its interest in property thus acquired; Block No. 1330, Lot No. 32 on the tax map for the borough of Brooklyn”.
